about_the_game:
Feast your eyes on an exclusive 4k wallpaper pack featuring characters from the game College Bound!

College Bound: Adult Art Collection DLC contains 20 high-quality images, each featuring a different scenery and a beautiful lady proudly presenting her... great personality. Get your mind and body ready, as the wallpapers' common theme is too few clothes on models!

Wallpapers feature College Bound characters such as Blanca, Lynda, Lisa, Miranda, Mia, Shanice, Mary, Anna, Tiffany, Sina, Jess, Amber, Willow, and Aisha.

How to access the wallpapers once you purchase the DLC?

  • 1. Right-click College Bound in your Steam game library
  • 2. Select Browse Local Files under Local Files tab
  • 3. Select the game folder from the game's local files, then click on the adult_art_collection folder.

Done! Now you can enjoy all of the uncensored wallpapers in 4K resolution. In case you still have trouble localizing the files, feel free to message me on Discord, you'll get further help.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC contains 20 high-quality 4K wallpapers featuring partially or fully nude College Bound characters in various environments.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
